page1.title: Add to list
page1.desc: Don't have time to do the activity you see at that moment?  Easily add what you want to watch, read and listen to later.

page2.title: Start timing
page2.desc: You can set an alarm so that we recommend you a random one of the content that you have saved at certain times. It's up to you to choose what kind of alarm you want.

page3.title: Click notification
page3.desc: You can have random content by clicking on the notification we send you at the time you specify. Then we can update the content for you or direct redirect to the relevant site.

page4.title: Enjoy
page4.desc: All you have to do is enjoy your activity!

empty.title: No completed content
empty.subtitle: You don't have any a completed content, yet. Your history will appear here.

alertAdd.title: Input fields must not be empty

emptyList.title: EMPTY!!
emptyList.subtitle: There is nothing on your list. Let's start adding.

timing.empty: No created alarm clocks. Start creating a new alarm clock by tapping + button.

alertDelete.title: Delete Confirmation
alertDelete.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

alertOpenLink.title: Referral Confirmation
alertOpenLink.subtitle: Are you sure you want to be forwarded to the relevant address?

alertbacklist.subtitle: Are you sure you want to add this item to list again?

detail.title: Detail
detail.notfound: Sorry, we couldn't find an activity in your list that matches your search. Please try choosing a different type.
